comments:
When trying to import files into a project (java source files into a java
project) the directory browse function hangs the program.  This is under GTK. 
The file chooser dialog box comes up but is not responsive, it does not respond
to either mouse clicks or keyboard entry.  The import dialog box that launched
the file chooser will accept input but will not do anything noticable with it. 
Killing the import dialog box results in the an internal error dialog box with
the  text: A SWT error has occured ... 

And the follwing stack trace: 

org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: Widget is disposed
